dataaccess.CustomerRowDataGateway

    • Uses of CustomerRowDataGateway in dataaccess

      Methods in dataaccess that return CustomerRowDataGateway 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CustomerRowDataGateway CustomerRowDataGateway.getCustomerById(int id)
      Fetches a customer given its internal id number and returns a CustomerRowGateway object with the data retrieved from the repository.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Optional<CustomerRowDataGateway> CustomerRowDataGateway.getCustomerByVATNumber(int vat)
